(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Method 
          (MethodName 
            (Identifier "foo")) 
          (Statement 
            (Arg 
              (Primary 
                (Begin 
                  (Statement 
                    (MethodCall 
                      (ArgumentList 
                        (Arg 
                          (Primary 
                            (String)))) 
                      (Variable 
                        (Identifier "puts")))))))))))))
